desc: Configuration of authenticator using built-in database as data source.

fields.desc: Specify whether to use `clientid` or `username` for authentication.
fields.name: user_id_type

fields.desc: Options for password hash creation and verification.
fields.name: password_hash_algorithm

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this auth provider.
fields.name: enable

desc: Configuration of authenticator using HTTP Server as authentication service (Using GET request).

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this auth provider.
fields.name: enable

fields.desc: The timeout when connecting to the HTTP server.
fields.name: connect_timeout

fields.desc: A positive integer. Whether to send HTTP requests continuously, when set to 1, it means that after each HTTP request is sent, you need to wait for the server to return and then continue to send the next request.
fields.name: enable_pipelining

desc: Configuration of authenticator using HTTP Server as authentication service (Using POST request).

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this auth provider.
fields.name: enable

fields.desc: The timeout when connecting to the HTTP server.
fields.name: connect_timeout

fields.desc: A positive integer. Whether to send HTTP requests continuously, when set to 1, it means that after each HTTP request is sent, you need to wait for the server to return and then continue to send the next request.
fields.name: enable_pipelining

desc: Configuration when the JWT for authentication is issued using the HMAC algorithm.

fields.desc: JWT signing algorithm, Supports HMAC (configured as hmac-based) and RSA, ECDSA (configured as public-key).
fields.name: algorithm

fields.desc: The key to verify the JWT using HMAC algorithm.
fields.name: secret

fields.desc: JWT claim name to use for getting ACL rules.
fields.name: acl_claim_name

fields.desc: A list of custom claims to validate, which is a list of name/value pairs. Values can use the following placeholders: - ${username}: Will be replaced at runtime with Username used by the client when connecting - ${clientid}: Will be replaced at runtime with Client ID used by the client when connecting Authentication will verify that the value of claims in the JWT (taken from the Password field) matches what is required in verify_claims.
fields.name: verify_claims

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this auth provider.
fields.name: enable

desc: Configuration when JWTs used for authentication need to be fetched from the JWKS endpoint.

fields.desc: JWKS endpoint, it's a read-only endpoint that returns the server's public key set in the JWKS format.
fields.name: endpoint

fields.desc: Size of the connection pool towards the bridge target service.
fields.name: pool_size

fields.desc: JWT claim name to use for getting ACL rules.
fields.name: acl_claim_name

fields.desc: A list of custom claims to validate, which is a list of name/value pairs. Values can use the following placeholders: - ${username}: Will be replaced at runtime with Username used by the client when connecting - ${clientid}: Will be replaced at runtime with Client ID used by the client when connecting Authentication will verify that the value of claims in the JWT (taken from the Password field) matches what is required in verify_claims.
fields.name: verify_claims

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this auth provider.
fields.name: enable

desc: Configuration when the JWT for authentication is issued using RSA or ECDSA algorithm.

fields.desc: JWT signing algorithm, Supports HMAC (configured as hmac-based) and RSA, ECDSA (configured as public-key).
fields.name: algorithm

fields.desc: The public key used to verify the JWT.
fields.name: public_key

fields.desc: JWT claim name to use for getting ACL rules.
fields.name: acl_claim_name

fields.desc: A list of custom claims to validate, which is a list of name/value pairs. Values can use the following placeholders: - ${username}: Will be replaced at runtime with Username used by the client when connecting - ${clientid}: Will be replaced at runtime with Client ID used by the client when connecting Authentication will verify that the value of claims in the JWT (taken from the Password field) matches what is required in verify_claims.
fields.name: verify_claims

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this auth provider.
fields.name: enable

desc: Configuration of authenticator using MongoDB (Replica Set) as authentication data source.

fields.desc: Collection used to store authentication data.
fields.name: collection

fields.desc: Conditional expression that defines the filter condition in the query. Filter supports the following placeholders: - ${username}: Will be replaced at runtime with Username used by the client when connecting - ${clientid}: Will be replaced at runtime with Client ID used by the client when connecting
fields.name: filter

fields.desc: Document field that contains password hash.
fields.name: password_hash_field

fields.desc: Document field that contains the password salt.
fields.name: salt_field

fields.desc: Document field that defines if the user has superuser privileges.
fields.name: is_superuser_field

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this auth provider.
fields.name: enable

fields.desc: Replica set. Must be set to 'rs' when MongoDB server is running in 'replica set' mode.
fields.name: mongo_type

fields.desc:
A Node list for Cluster to connect to. The nodes should be separated with commas, such as: `Node[,Node].`
For each Node should be: The IPv4 or IPv6 address or the hostname to connect to.
A host entry has the following form: `Host[:Port]`.
The MongoDB default port 27017 is used if `[:Port]` is not specified.
fields.name: servers

fields.desc: Size of the connection pool towards the bridge target service.
fields.name: pool_size

fields.desc: EMQX's username in the external database.
fields.name: username

fields.desc: EMQX's password in the external database.
fields.name: password

fields.desc: Database name associated with the user's credentials.
fields.name: auth_source

A host entry has the following form: `Host[:Port]`.

desc: Configuration of authenticator using MySQL as authentication data source.

fields.desc: SQL used to query data for authentication, such as password hash.
fields.name: query

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this auth provider.
fields.name: enable

fields.desc:
The IPv4 or IPv6 address or the hostname to connect to.
A host entry has the following form: `Host[:Port]`.
The MySQL default port 3306 is used if `[:Port]` is not specified.
fields.name: server

fields.desc: Size of the connection pool towards the bridge target service.
fields.name: pool_size

fields.desc: EMQX's username in the external database.
fields.name: username

fields.desc: EMQX's password in the external database.
fields.name: password

desc: Configuration of authenticator using PostgreSQL as authentication data source.

fields.desc: SQL used to query data for authentication, such as password hash.
fields.name: query

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this auth provider.
fields.name: enable

fields.desc:
The IPv4 or IPv6 address or the hostname to connect to.
A host entry has the following form: `Host[:Port]`.
The PostgreSQL default port 5432 is used if `[:Port]` is not specified.
fields.name: server

fields.desc: Size of the connection pool towards the bridge target service.
fields.name: pool_size

fields.desc: EMQX's username in the external database.
fields.name: username

fields.desc: EMQX's password in the external database.
fields.name: password

desc: Configuration of authenticator using Redis (Cluster) as authentication data source.

fields.desc: The Redis Command used to query data for authentication such as password hash, currently only supports HGET and HMGET.
fields.name: cmd

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this auth provider.
fields.name: enable

fields.desc:
A Node list for Cluster to connect to. The nodes should be separated with commas, such as: `Node[,Node].`
For each Node should be: The IPv4 or IPv6 address or the hostname to connect to.
A host entry has the following form: `Host[:Port]`.
The Redis default port 6379 is used if `[:Port]` is not specified.
fields.name: servers

fields.desc: Cluster mode. Must be set to 'cluster' when Redis server is running in clustered mode.
fields.name: redis_type

fields.desc: Size of the connection pool towards the bridge target service.
fields.name: pool_size

fields.desc: EMQX's password in the external database.
fields.name: password

desc: Configuration of authenticator using Redis (Sentinel) as authentication data source.

fields.desc: The Redis Command used to query data for authentication such as password hash, currently only supports HGET and HMGET.
fields.name: cmd

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this auth provider.
fields.name: enable

fields.desc:
A Node list for Cluster to connect to. The nodes should be separated with commas, such as: `Node[,Node].`
For each Node should be: The IPv4 or IPv6 address or the hostname to connect to.
A host entry has the following form: `Host[:Port]`.
The Redis default port 6379 is used if `[:Port]` is not specified.
fields.name: servers

fields.desc: Sentinel mode. Must be set to 'sentinel' when Redis server is running in sentinel mode.
fields.name: redis_type

fields.desc: The cluster name in Redis sentinel mode.
fields.name: sentinel

fields.desc: Size of the connection pool towards the bridge target service.
fields.name: pool_size

fields.desc: EMQX's password in the external database.
fields.name: password

desc: Configuration of authenticator using Redis (Standalone) as authentication data source.

fields.desc: The Redis Command used to query data for authentication such as password hash, currently only supports HGET and HMGET.
fields.name: cmd

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this auth provider.
fields.name: enable

fields.desc:
The IPv4 or IPv6 address or the hostname to connect to.
A host entry has the following form: `Host[:Port]`.
The Redis default port 6379 is used if `[:Port]` is not specified.
fields.name: server

fields.desc: Single mode. Must be set to 'single' when Redis server is running in single mode.
fields.name: redis_type

fields.desc: Size of the connection pool towards the bridge target service.
fields.name: pool_size

fields.desc: EMQX's password in the external database.

desc:
Settings for Salted Challenge Response Authentication Mechanism
(SCRAM) authentication.

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this auth provider.
